examples: The government has declared a state of emergency.
El gobierno ha declarado el estado de emergencia.
Germany declared war on France on 1 August 1914.
Alemania declaró la guerra a Francia el 1 de agosto de 1914.
The government has declared war on (= officially stated its intention to stop) illiteracy.
El gobierno ha declarado la guerra (= ha declarado oficialmente su intención de acabar) con el analfabetismo.
He will probably have to declare bankruptcy.
Probablemente tendrá que declararse en quiebra.
